body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Alpha Auto Security. My name is Joe Robinson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Samantha. Could you provide me with your phone number starting with the area code, with a similar format to double two four, five five five, one two three four?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is double three zero, six one eight, four eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Can you also share with me the first letter of your city followed by the remaining digits of your postal code, for example, M one two three A B C?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my city starts with S and the postal code remaining digits are three five zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Samantha, for providing the information we needed. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Samantha. Thank you for contacting us. Have a great day!
